column5: I have see a real B29 fly. Don't remember the same maneuverability though. Quite the control!!!  http://users.skynet.be/fa926657/files/B29.wmv
That's outrageous! Who pulled off the stunts after the pilot bailed out? LOL -Brian
Very cool video. I wonder if a pilot of a real b29 would be inclined to do some of the stunts these guys did, like fly up-side down and inverted rolls! HH
Thanks John, that was incredible !!  WW11, South Pacific, Enola Gay & Chuck Yeager all rolled into miniature.....beautiful !!
wow, forgot it wasn't a real  a few times.. if he lost control of it, it is so big it would sure do a lot of damage
I can really appreciate that video. I've had an RC helicopter since December and believe me, radio control is very hard to master.
